sense.name: a plan of action, approach
sense.examples: Foreign policy is a strategy governing international relations. The schools have adopted a zero-tolerance policy towards drugs. It was a policy of retribution. He thought it good policy to take the advice of his superiors.

sense.name: Insurance policy
sense.commentary: POLICY[+entity][+artifact][+document][+legal][+insurance][+life/+home/+health/+auto] Written contract or certificate of insurance
sense.examples: You should have read the small print on your homeowner's policy. I've never missed an insurance policy payment. We put our insurance policies in the safe deposit box.

sense.name: an illegal lottery or numbers game
sense.examples: The gangster ran several policies on the south side of Chicago. The kid lost a lot of money playing a policy in the back of the pool hall.
